title: FASAB: Eliminating the Category National Defense Property, Plant, and Equipment: Rescinding SFFAS No. 11, Amendments to Property, Plant, and Equipment--Definitional Changes; Amending SFFAS No. 8, Supplementary Stewardship Reporting Amending SFFAS No. 6, Accounting for Property, Plant, and Equipment: Statement of Federal Financial Accounting Standards No. 23
